title: Simulation-Based Instruction for Enhancing Scientific Literacy in Pre-Service Physics Teachers Using CPI Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational physics theories and teaching experience
context.additional_context: A program for in-company physical education managers/leaders to enhance scientific literacy by applying the CPI teaching method in VR simulation and BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can utilize knowledge required to scientifically explain physical phenomena with over 80% accuracy.
Learners successfully apply scientific inquiry design and evaluation skills in simulation tasks at least twice out of three attempts.
Learners achieve over 70% proficiency in interpreting experimental data and presenting scientific evidence in VR tasks.

resources: CPI (Communicative Pedagogical Intervention) Teaching Method Manual

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
